data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during DORDRECHT cruise from Curacao to Hellevoetsluis started at 1838-06-23

Ship: Dordrecht (Transportschip), Voyage: Curacao - Hellevoetsluis, 1st Observer: H.H.T. Coops (Kltz), Company: MAR, Other ship information: BEMAND MET 56 KOPPEN EN BEWAPEND MET 12 KARONNADES VAN 12 POND
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
